dict.acceptation: 通常的，常有的，常见的；平常的，普通的；平时的，平日的；一向的，老是那一套的；

sent.orig: Thus my usual trouser man is quite different from my usual coat man.
sent.trans: 于是平时给我做裤子的裁缝就不同于平时给我做上衣的裁缝。

sent.orig: This additional unit is composed of usual single chip microcomputer system or usual programming controller unit.
sent.trans: 这个附加单元由常规元件、单片机系统或通用的PC模块组成。

sent.orig: A smaller-than-usual increase in China's-exchange reserves last quarter a-than-usual controversy.
sent.trans: 中国上个季度的外汇储备增幅低于往常，但引发的争论却甚于以往。

sent.orig: But they also expect slower than usual slower-than-usual recovery.
sent.trans: 但是他们同时预测恢复会比通常更缓慢。

sent.orig: My usual chair had been moved from its usual place.
sent.trans: 我平常用的椅子已从老地方移开了。
